ygData.subject: deploying cantera under ms visual c++ 2005
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Does anyone have experience with MS vc++ 2005 and cantera? I have the CVS version cantera which I can load (cvs has vc++ 2003 files) into vc++ 2005.

Hello all,

Does anyone have experience with MS vc++ 2005 and cantera? I ha=
ve the 
CVS version cantera which I can load (cvs has vc++ 2003 files) into=
 
vc++ 2005.

Problem is that vc++ 2005 (both the express 'free version' or=
 the 
standard version) dont support 'vdproj' type files for the setup and =

deployment of cantera. Instead 'oneclick' deployment is available. Only 
t=
he professional version supports this, which I dont have.

Does anyone know=
 how to deploy cantera using this 'oneclick' method?

Thanks to anyone who =
can help. 

Adam.
